info.name: SG-Gaming Dark
info.description: Dark Mode for sg-gaming.net, simply changes from a bright white to a blue dark.
info.additionalInfo:
1.0 - Initial Release
1.1 - Fixed small problems with text, changed the admin colours to purple
1.2 - Minor fixes
1.3 - Changed all tooltips to dark
1.4 - Fixed every known problem in the "Whats New" section
1.5 - Added a darker searchbar,  darker "Alerts" menu, and a darker profile menu
1.6 - Fixed all areas where hovering caused a bright white background, changed all buttons to a smooth dark
1.7 - Fixed all known problems
1.8 - Fixed problems within the admin panel
1.9 - Added new features to profiles and avatars
1.10 - Final stylish release. Google webstore coming soon!
1.10x -
1.10xx -
1.10xxx -
1.10xxxx -
